pages.text: 'clr184' is the least known universe of all, at the time of writing. We do not know anything about this universe except for the only two objects it provides.
No photograph is available for this universe : use your imagination !
List of objects brought by Déjà-vu in our world : $(br)$(list)$(item)Oscillating Crystal$() $(list)$(item)Colorful Lamp$()

pages.title: The Oscillating Crystal
pages.text: A quartz crystal capable of providing an oscillating energy signal. (In our world, energy is redstone).
